commit.message:
Merge pull request #2819 from topecongiro/duplicated-paren

Avoid inserting the closing paren after tuple struct containing parentheses and a where clause

Merge pull request #2819 from topecongiro/duplicated-paren

Avoid inserting the closing paren after tuple struct containing parentheses and a where clause
